gilt_head_bream.habitat: Coastal waters of the Mediterranean Sea and eastern North Atlantic Ocean
gilt_head_bream.fun_fact: They can live up to 25 years and are prized in Mediterranean cuisine.

red_sea_bream.habitat: Warm temperate waters of the western Pacific Ocean
red_sea_bream.fun_fact: Also known as madai in Japan and often used in celebratory dishes.
